metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins: publication workflows, research paper management, fiction worldbuilding, content cross-posting, and repository management

plugins.name: pub-pipeline
plugins.description: Unified publication pipeline: R packages (CRAN/JOSS/JSS), Python packages (PyPI), and academic preprints (OSF/MetaArXiv)

plugins.name: papermill
plugins.description: Research paper lifecycle management — thesis refinement, literature surveys, experimental design, editorial review, and publication venue matching

plugins.name: worldsmith
plugins.description: Documentation-first worldbuilding methodology for fiction projects. The Silmarillion approach: docs ARE the world, story text derives from them.

plugins.name: mf
plugins.description: Metafunctor site management — blog architecture, content workflows, and mf CLI

plugins.name: repoindex
plugins.description: Collection-aware repository intelligence — query, analyze, and maintain your git repository collection

plugins.name: alex-confidential
plugins.description: Confidentiality toolkit — smart routing across cryptoid, pagevault, and gpg encryption tools

plugins.name: kdp
plugins.description: Amazon KDP book publishing: manuscript audit, listing craft, and submission workflow

plugins.name: jot
plugins.description: Journal-aware Claude Code sessions — surfaces relevant tasks, ideas, and plans from your jot journal

plugins.name: crier
plugins.description: Cross-post blog content to multiple platforms — audit, publish, rewrite, and track content distribution via the crier CLI
